insert into h_job (`name`, `desc`, create_time, creator, creator_name, modify_time, modifier, modifier_name) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update h_job set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `desc`, create_time, creator, creator_name, modify_time, modifier, modifier_name from h_job where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, `desc`, create_time, creator, creator_name, modify_time, modifier, modifier_name from h_job
